sentences.sContent: The groom was so nervous he forgot to compliment the bridesmaids.
sentences.sCn: 新郎太紧张了，都忘了夸奖伴娘。

synos.tran: 恭维；称赞；问候；致意；道贺

phrases.pCn: 言不由衷(或挖苦人)的恭维话

remMethod.val: com(共同) + pli(满， 填满) + ment(名词后缀) → 一起满足某人的愿望 → 赞美

trans.tranOther: to say something nice to someone in order to praise them
a remark that shows you admire someone or something
